author: Odeinoichus
title: Quackaroonie!
review:
Set #71024 Dewey: Sharing the same parts as his brother, Dewey is dressed all in blue, he includes a slingshot and a spare for getting up to mischief.

Rather short review, isn't it? The hats worn by the triplets all use the same small connector element, I have not tried it yet, but it may be possible to attach them to Mini-Doll hair pieces. Which would be interesting. Honestly I can't think of much else to say, once you discussed the features of one triplet, aside from the colouring, you've discussed them all. Dewey is a great addition to the collection and Highly Recommended.
